snippet: Beau Biden, the son of Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr., is being evaluated after “an episode of disorientation and weakness,” according to a White House statement released Monday night.
abstract: Beau Biden, the son of Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr., is being evaluated after “an episode of disorientation and weakness,” according to a White House statement released Monday night.

headline.main: Biden's Son Admitted to Houston Hospital for Tests
